クラスNeo4j.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.helidon.integrations.neo4j.Neo4j.Builder

Builder<Neo4j.Builder,Neo4j>, Supplier<Neo4j>

Neo4j
public static final class Neo4j.Builder extends Object implements Builder<Neo4j.Builder,Neo4j>
Neo4j用のFluent APIビルダー。
